CustomField.formula:
CASE(Allocation_Source__c,
"National Retailer Coop Request", (BLANKVALUE(Lease_Cost__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Podium_Cost__c, 0) + BLANKVALUE(Shirt_Cost__c, 0)),
"Marketing Fee Reimbursement", (BLANKVALUE(Lease_Cost__c, 0) - BLANKVALUE(Lease_Cost__c, 0) * BLANKVALUE(Reimbursement_percentage__c,0)),
0)
CustomField.label: Total Cost
